Articles.Content:
It looks ugly. Very ugly.

You have to get it off the launch pad in a few seconds or it explodes.

If you do, you can get a clear shot to the mun.

The rocket is all stock, except for Silisko\'s mini-SRBs (which double as lander legs), mechanical decouplers, and orbital achievement engine.

The stages require proper timing for maximum efficiency.

T+0 takeoff

T+22 initiate stage 2, boosters

T+63 eject burnt-out boosters and empty fuel tanks
